00016 clElement3D::clElement3D(clUnstructured3D *volumeGrid, const int numberID, const int nNodes, const int nFaces, const int nFaceNodes)
00017 {
00018   parentGrid = volumeGrid;
00019 
00020   SetNumberID(numberID);
00021   ResetInitialised();
00022   ResetHalo();
00023   ResetBoundary();
00024 
00025   volume = (double)(-1);
00026 
00027   SetNumberNodes(nNodes);
00028   SetNumberFaces(nFaces);
00029   SetNumberFaceNodes(nFaceNodes);
00030 
00031   // Reset all references to nodes and faces
00032   for(int n=0; n<GetNumberNodes(); n++) nodeIDArray.SetItem(n, -1);
00033   for(int f=0; f<GetNumberFaces(); f++) neighbourIDArray.SetItem(f, -1);
00034 }

00036 clElement3D::clElement3D(clUnstructured3D *volumeGrid, const int nNodes, const int nFaces, const int nFaceNodes)
00037 {
00038   parentGrid = volumeGrid;
00039 
00040   SetNumberID(0);
00041   ResetInitialised();
00042   ResetHalo();
00043   ResetBoundary();
00044 
00045   volume = (double)(-1);
00046 
00047   SetNumberNodes(nNodes);
00048   SetNumberFaces(nFaces);
00049   SetNumberFaceNodes(nFaceNodes);

00051   // Reset all references to nodes and faces
00052   for(int n=0; n<GetNumberNodes(); n++) nodeIDArray.SetItem(n, -1);
00053   for(int f=0; f<GetNumberFaces(); f++) neighbourIDArray.SetItem(f, -1);
00054 }

00124 int clElement3D::GetNodeID(const int index) const
00125 {
00126   /*
00127   ** Returns the node ID given the node index
00128   */
00129 
00130   if(index<0 || index>=GetNumberNodes())
00131   {
00132     throw clException("clElement3D", "GetNodeID", "Invalid index specification.");
00133   }
00134 
00135   return(nodeIDArray.GetItem(index));
00136 }
00137 
00138 int clElement3D::GetNeighbourID(const int index) const
00139 {
00140   /*
00141   ** Returns the neighbour ID given a face index
00142   */
00143 
00144   if(index<0 || index>=GetNumberFaces())
00145   {
00146     throw clException("clElement3D", "GetNeighbourID", "Invalid index specification.");
00147   }
00148 
00149   return(neighbourIDArray.GetItem(index));
00150 }

00152 int clElement3D::SetNodeID(const int nodeIndex, const int nodeID)
00153 {
00154   /*
00155   ** Sets the node ID for a given node index
00156   */
00157 
00158   if(nodeIndex<0 || nodeIndex>=GetNumberNodes())
00159   {
00160     throw clException("clElement3D", "SetNodeID", "Invalid index specified.");
00161   }
00162 
00163   // Set the node
00164   nodeIDArray.SetItem(nodeIndex, nodeID);
00165 
00166   return(GetNumberNodes());
00167 }

00169 int clElement3D::SetNeighbourID(const int faceIndex, const int neighbourID)
00170 {
00171   /*
00172   ** Sets the neighbour ID for a given face index
00173   */
00174 
00175   if(faceIndex<0 || faceIndex>=GetNumberFaces())
00176   {
00177     throw clException("clElement3D", "SetNeighbourID", "Invalid index specified.");
00178   }
00179 
00180   // Set the face
00181   neighbourIDArray.SetItem(faceIndex, neighbourID);
00182 
00183   return(GetNumberFaces());
00184 }

00186 void clElement3D::DeleteNodeRef(const int nodeIndex)
00187 {
00188   /*
00189   ** Sets the node ID to -1 given a node index
00190   */
00191 
00192   try
00193   {
00194     nodeIDArray.SetItem(nodeIndex, -1);
00195   }
00196 
00197   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00198   {
00199     EX.AddMethodToTree("clElement3D::DeleteNodeRef");
00200     throw EX;
00201   }
00202 }

00222 int clElement3D::GetNodeIndex(const int nodeID) const
00223 {
00224   int nodeIndex = 0;
00225 
00226   try
00227   {
00228     while(nodeIndex<GetNumberNodes() && GetNodeID(nodeIndex)!=nodeID)
00229     {
00230       nodeIndex++;
00231     }
00232 
00233     if(GetNodeID(nodeIndex)!=nodeID)
00234     {
00235       char message[MESLEN];
00236       sprintf(message, "Could not find nodeIndex.\n    NODEID   = %d\n", nodeID);
00237       throw clExceptionTree("clElement3D", "GetNodeIndex", message);
00238     }
00239   }
00240 
00241   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00242   {
00243     EX.AddMethodToTree("clElement3D::GetNodeIndex");
00244     throw EX;
00245   }
00246 
00247    return(nodeIndex);
00248 }

00250 int clElement3D::GetFaceIndex(const int neighbourID) const
00251 {
00252   int faceIndex = 0;
00253 
00254   try
00255   {
00256     while(faceIndex<GetNumberFaces() && (GetNeighbourID(faceIndex)!=neighbourID))
00257     {
00258       faceIndex++;
00259     }
00260 
00261     if(GetNeighbourID(faceIndex)!=neighbourID)
00262     {
00263       char message[MESLEN];
00264       sprintf(message, "Could not find faceEntry pointing to neighbour.\n    ELEMENTID   = %d\n    NEIGHBOURID = %d\n", GetNumberID(), neighbourID);
00265       throw clExceptionTree("clElement3D", "GetFaceIndex", message);
00266     }
00267   }
00268 
00269   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00270   {
00271     EX.AddMethodToTree("clElement3D::GetFaceIndex");
00272     throw EX;
00273   }
00274 
00275   return(faceIndex);
00276 }

00278 int clElement3D::FindFaceIndex(const int theNeighbourID) const
00279 {
00280   int theFaceIndex = 0;
00281 
00282   try
00283   {
00284     while(theFaceIndex<GetNumberFaces() && (GetNeighbourID(theFaceIndex)!=theNeighbourID))
00285     {
00286       theFaceIndex++;
00287     }
00288 
00289     if(GetNeighbourID(theFaceIndex)!=theNeighbourID)
00290     {
00291       char message[MESLEN];
00292       sprintf(message, "Could not find faceIndex pointing to neighbour.\n    ELEMENTID   = %d\n    NEIGHBOURID = %d\n", GetNumberID(), theNeighbourID);
00293       throw clExceptionTree("clElement3D", "FindFaceIndex", message);
00294     }
00295   }
00296 
00297   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00298   {
00299     EX.AddMethodToTree("clElement3D::FindFaceIndex");
00300     throw EX;
00301   }
00302 
00303   return(theFaceIndex);
00304 }

00306 bool clElement3D::IsElementNode(const int nodeID) const
00307 {
00308   bool ret = false;
00309 
00310   for(int n=0; n<GetNumberNodes() && !ret; n++)
00311   {
00312     if(GetNodeID(n) == nodeID)
00313     {
00314       ret =  true;
00315     }
00316   }
00317 
00318   return(ret);
00319 }

00370 int clElement3D::IsNodeInElement(const clNode3D *theNode) const
00371 {
00372   //
00373   // IN :    *theNode    = the node to be investigated
00374   // RETURN: ID of current tetrahedron in case it covers theNode,
00375   //         or ID of one of the neighbours.
00376   //
00377   int    tetraID = GetNumberID();
00378   double det     = (double)(-1);
00379   bool   onFace  = false;
00380 
00381   try
00382   {
00383     // Translate node indices in face system to node indices in parentgrid system
00384     int faceNodes[GetNumberFaceNodes()];
00385 
00386     //
00387     // Search all faces as long as the face vertices form a left-handed axes system.
00388     // (det<0 --> left-handed axes system --> theNode on the inside of tetrahedron).
00389     //
00390     int f=0;
00391     while(det<=0.0f && f<GetNumberFaces())
00392     {
00393       // Get the node indices in tetrahedron system
00394       GetFaceNodes(f, faceNodes);
00395 
00396       // Get NodeIDs
00397       int idNode0 = GetNodeID(faceNodes[0]);
00398       int idNode1 = GetNodeID(faceNodes[1]);
00399       int idNode2 = GetNodeID(faceNodes[GetNumberFaceNodes()-1]);
00400 
00401       // Get node indices in volumeGrid system
00402       int inNode0 = parentGrid->GetNodeIndex(idNode0);
00403       int inNode1 = parentGrid->GetNodeIndex(idNode1);
00404       int inNode2 = parentGrid->GetNodeIndex(idNode2);
00405 
00406       // Get Node Pointers
00407       clNode3D *node0 = parentGrid->GetNodePointer(inNode0);
00408       clNode3D *node1 = parentGrid->GetNodePointer(inNode1);
00409       clNode3D *node2 = parentGrid->GetNodePointer(inNode2);
00410 
00411       // Set up vectors
00412       double x1 = node1->x() - node0->x();
00413       double x2 = node1->y() - node0->y();
00414       double x3 = node1->z() - node0->z();
00415 
00416       double y1 = node2->x() - node0->x();
00417       double y2 = node2->y() - node0->y();
00418       double y3 = node2->z() - node0->z();
00419 
00420       double z1 = theNode->x() - node0->x();
00421       double z2 = theNode->y() - node0->y();
00422       double z3 = theNode->z() - node0->z();
00423 
00424       double det1 = x1*(y2*z3-y3*z2);
00425       double det2 = x2*(y1*z3-y3*z1);
00426       double det3 = x3*(y1*z2-y2*z1);
00427       det = det1 - det2 + det3;
00428 
00429       if(det==0.0f) onFace = true;
00430 
00431       f++;
00432     }
00433 
00434     if(det>0.0f)
00435     {
00436       // Continue with neighbour tetrahedron
00437       f--;
00438       tetraID=GetNeighbourID(f);
00439     }
00440     else if(onFace)
00441     {
00442       char message[MESLEN];
00443       sprintf(message, "Node positioned on face of element.\n    ELEMENTID = %d", GetNumberID());
00444 //      throw clExceptionTree("clElement3D", "IsNodeInElement", message);
00445     }
00446   }
00447 
00448   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00449   {
00450     EX.AddMethodToTree("clElement3D::IsNodeInElement");
00451     throw EX;
00452   }
00453 
00454   return(tetraID);
00455 }

00457 void clElement3D::CalculateVolume(void)

00459   volume = (double) (-1);

00462 double clElement3D::GetVolume(void)
00463 {

00465   return(volume);

00468 clElement3D& clElement3D::Assign(const clElement3D &source)
00469 {
00470   SetParentGrid(source.GetParentGrid());
00471   SetNumberID(source.GetNumberID());
00472   SetNumberNodes(source.GetNumberNodes());
00473   SetNumberFaces(source.GetNumberFaces());
00474   SetNumberFaceNodes(source.GetNumberFaceNodes());
00475 
00476   source.IsInitialised() ? SetInitialised() : ResetInitialised();
00477   source.IsHalo() ? SetHalo() : ResetHalo();
00478   source.IsBoundary() ? SetBoundary() : ResetBoundary();
00479 
00480   for(int n=0; n<source.GetNumberNodes(); n++)
00481   {
00482     SetNodeID(n, source.GetNodeID(n));
00483   }
00484 
00485   for(int f=0; f<source.GetNumberFaces(); f++)
00486   {
00487     SetNeighbourID(f, source.GetNeighbourID(f));
00488   }
00489 
00490   return(*this);
00491 }
00492 
00493 clElement3D& clElement3D::operator=(const clElement3D &source)
00494 {
00495   return(Assign(source));
00496 }
00497 
00498 bool clElement3D::IsEqual(const clElement3D &source) const
00499 {
00500   /*
00501   ** Does not evaluate 'numberID'
00502   */
00503   int ret = 0; //0 = not equal; 1 = equal
00504 
00505   for(int n=0; n<GetNumberNodes(); n++)
00506   {
00507     if(GetNodeID(n) != source.GetNodeID(n))
00508     {
00509       ret = false;
00510     }
00511   }
00512 
00513   for(int f=0; f<GetNumberFaces(); f++)
00514   {
00515     if(GetNeighbourID(f) != source.GetNeighbourID(f))
00516     {
00517       ret = false;
00518     }
00519   }
00520 
00521   return(ret);
00522 }
00523 
00524 bool clElement3D::operator==(const clElement3D &source) const
00525 {
00526   return(IsEqual(source));
00527 }
00528 
00529 bool clElement3D::operator!=(const clElement3D &source) const
00530 {
00531   return(!IsEqual(source));
00532 }
